item.title: About
item.description:
Currently, I am pursuing a Master of Science in Computational Biology and Bioinformatics at ETH ZÃ¼rich. Previously, I completed a Bachelor of Science degree in Applied Biology with Biotechnology from the ABCT Department at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University. Additionally, I participated in an exchange program at the University of Waterloo in 2017.

My one page resume: PDF

This blog is mainly for my personal use, including personal blogs (thoughts, opinions), technical document (design doc) or just some snippets I found online.

Opinions expressed here are solely my own and do not express the views or opinions of my employer(s) or school(s).
